word:
"Concerning the work in behalf of the Jewish people being done by Brother -----, I am instructed to say, Give him all the encouragement that is possible. Do not bind about his work by many forbiddings. Help him, so that through his efforts, and the efforts of his fellow-laborers, many of 
                                                                           11
the seed of Israel may be grafted to the true stock, Christ Jesus. . . . . .
